To kick off 2020, I'm joining the #100DaysOfGatsby challenge. This code is the blog that will document my journey

## üöÄ Challenges

1. Challenge #1: Create a Gatsby Blog from Scratch
1. Challenge #2: Build and Deploy Your Gatsby Site (Using Free Tools)
1. Challenge #3: Auto-Optimize Images on Your Gatsby Site
1. Challenge #4: Import 3rd-party React components
1. Challenge #5: Add React Components in Markdown
1. Challenge #6: Use Serverless Functions and Services to Collect Form Data
1. Challenge #7: Turn Your Gatsby Site into a Progressive Web App
